TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FabricNotPrimaryException extends System.Fabric.FabricException

summary.para: The exception that is thrown when the callee is not a primary.

remarks.para: The indicates that the operation cannot be performed because the callee is currently not a primary. For example, this exception can be observed if a secondary replica attempted to replicate an operation via . A likely scenario is that the replica is no longer the primary.

Handling for Reliable Collections : 1. If the service sees in RunAsync, it should catch the exception, complete all tasks and return from RunAsync. The passed to RunAsync would be signalled. All background tasks should complete execution when this cancellation is signalled. 2. If the service sees while processing a client request (e.g. via their communication listener), the service should throw the exception to the client to signal the client that it should re-resolve the service in order to locate the new Primary.
